bibl.title: with the assistance of Sandra CAIRNS and Frederick WILLIAMS, Papers of the Langford Latin Seminar. Thirteenth Volume 2008. Hellenistic Greek and Augustan, Latin Poetry, Flavian and Post-Flavian Latin Poetry, Grrek and Roman Prose
bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 80 (2008), Bibl. Beilage 4, pp. 114-115.
ACOSTA-HUGHES Benjamin, Unwilling Farewell and Complex Allusion (Sappho, Callimachus and Aeneid 6.458).

Francis CAIRNS (Ed.), with the assistance of Sandra CAIRNS and Frederick WILLIAMS, Papers of the Langford Latin Seminar. Thirteenth Volume 2008. Hellenistic Greek and Augustan, Latin Poetry, Flavian and Post-Flavian Latin Poetry, Grrek and Roman Prose = ARCA. 48 (Cambridge, 2008) pp. 1-11.
